item.description:
For those attending (or maybe), please check your email. I have sent out a message about locating us on the beach. If you did not receive this message, please check your spam and trash folders before you contact me. Lately, a lot of my good email has been turning up in my Yahoo spam folder.

Let's get together at the Narragansett Beach for this great concert. Bring your beach towels/chairs and maybe a dish to share. The concert is 8-10pm - let's get there earlier to avoid the traffic and have dinner and socialize before the music begins. If you cannot arrive earlier, I hope that you will come and join us for the music!
Here is more information: http://narragansettri...

This event is free, however they are asking for $1.00 donation of all attendees and if using certain parking areas, a $5.00 donation.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: 34th Annual Concert on the Beach - RI Philharmonic Orchestra
